Export.Routine:
MIF201RU01(mi) ; Test1 BCL ; 18JAN2011 by Mc_Fly - InterSystems BCN
s $zt="err" s mi=$g(mi) i '$l(mi) q s stx=$c(2),etx=$c(3),eot=$c(4),ack=$c(6),nak=$c(21) k ^TMP(mi,$j) d trace("*** Starting ***","DEBUG") i $$select^LVBMIMP(mi) d trace("Error select^LVBMIMP(mi)","DEBUG") q f j=1:1:PLIST s @("par"_j)=PLIST(j) i $$start^MIF000() d trace("Cannot open device "_par4,"DEBUG") q d trace("Started $j="_$j,"DEBUG")
s compiled=$lg(^rINDEX($zn,"OBJ"),1) ; Neutral State f d i $$stop^MIF000() q . d receive . i $lg(^rINDEX($zn,"OBJ"))'=compiled ztrap "EDIT"
c par4 d trace("Finished","DEBUG") k ^TMP(mi,$j) q receive ; Ready to receive f q:'$$read(stx,etx_eot,,30) d receiving q receiving s record=$e(record,2,$l(record)-1) ; remove <STX>....<ETX> d trace("record="_record,"DEBUG")
i $e(record)="R" d result q i $e(record)="Q" d query q d trace("Unknow message","DEBUG") q result ;s label=$tr($e(record,4,18)," ") s rack=+$e(record,19,20) s pos=+$e(record,21,22) s unk=$e(record,23,24) s res=$e(record,25,28) i $e(res)="-" s res="" i $l(res) s res=+res
d trace("rack="_rack_" pos="_pos_" unk="_unk_" res="_res,"DEBUG")
i '$l(rack) d trace("rack empty","DEBUG") q i '$l(pos) d trace("position empty","DEBUG") q i '$l(res) q
s label=$p($g(^TMIF(mi,"LL",rack,"PAT",pos)),"\",1) s epis=$e(label,1,9) i '$l(epis) q
s (sample,surname,date,time,QC)="" s result="VSG"_$c(par10)_res_$c(par10)_$c(par10)_$c(par10)_$c(par11) d trace("File epis="_epis_" sample="_sample_" result="_result_" QC="_QC,"DEBUG") d file^MIF000(mi,sample,epis,surname,result,date,time,QC) q query d trace("Query "_record,"DEBUG") q read(start,stop,term,timeout) n (mi,record,start,stop,term,timeout) ; start: string of start characters i.e. stx ; stop : string of stop characters i.e. etb_etx ; term : string of terminator characters i.e. eot ; Returns: 0 - Failed ; 1 - Done ; record = string received s start=$g(start),stop=$g(stop),term=$g(term),timeout=$g(timeout),ok=0 i '$l(start) s ok=1 i '$l(timeout) s timeout=30 s record="",swterm=0,zh=$zh f r *x:timeout q:x=-1 d q:swterm q:$f(stop,$c(x)) i ($zh-zh)>timeout s x=-2 q . i $f(term,$c(x)) s swterm=1 q . i 'ok,$f(start,$c(x)) s ok=1 . i 'ok d trace("Wait for "_start_" but received "_$c(x)) q . s record=record_$c(x) i swterm d d trace(mess) q 0 . s mess="Received terminate char "_$c(x) i $l(record) s mess=mess_". Record="_record i x=-1 d d trace(mess,,join) q 0 . s mess="Timeout ocurred",join=1 i $l(record) s mess=mess_". Record="_record,join=0 i x=-2 d d trace(mess) q 0 . s mess="General timeout ocurred" i $l(record) s mess=mess_". Record="_record d trace(record) q 1 err s $zt="" d trace($ze,"ERROR") d trace("Finished","DEBUG") k ^TMP(mi,$j)
i $f($ze,"<ZEDIT>") d trace("Autostarting...","DEBUG") x "j ^"_$zn_"(mi)" i $f($ze,"<READ>") d trace("Autostarting...","DEBUG") x "j ^"_$zn_"(mi)" q trace(mes,dir,join) n dt,date,last,r,times,n,max,z s mes=$g(mes),dir=$g(dir,"M-->H"),join=+$g(join) i '$l($g(mi)) q s dir=$e(dir_$j("",5),1,5),dt=$zu(188) ;s date=$p(dt,".",1)_"."_$e($p(dt,".",2)_"000",1,3) s date=$p(dt,".",1) i join d . s last=$o(^TMPmif(mi,99,""),-1) i '$l(last) q . s r=$g(^TMPmif(mi,99,last)) . i $p(r," : ",1)'=dir q . s wmes=$p(r," : ",3) . i $e(wmes,1,$l(mes))'=mes q . s times=$e(wmes,$l(mes)+1,$l(wmes)) i $l(times),times'?1" x"1.n q . s times=$p(times," x",2) i '$l(times) s times=1 . s mes=mes_" x"_(times+1) k ^TMPmif(mi,99,last) s n=$o(^TMPmif(mi,99,""),-1)+1 s ^TMPmif(mi,99,n)=dir_" : "_date_" : "_$$trans(mes)
s max=+$p($g(^TMIF(mi)),"\",20) i 'max s max=200 f z=n-max:-1 q:'$d(^TMPmif(mi,99,z)) k ^TMPmif(mi,99,z) q trans(txt) n new,n,a s new="" f n=1:1:$l(txt) s a=$a(txt,n) d . i a>127 s new=new_"<"_a_">" q . i a>31 s new=new_$c(a) q . i a=21 s new=new_"<NAK>" q . i a=6 s new=new_"<ACK>" q . i a=4 s new=new_"<EOT>" q . i a=3 s new=new_"<ETX>" q . i a=2 s new=new_"<STX>" q . s new=new_"<"_a_">" q new SAVE(mi) ; Create loadlist record d trace("Create loadlist record","DEBUG") q NEXTTRAY(tray) q tray+2
